Description.Text: Astoria Hotel Dubai Carries A Long Legacy Of Hospitality, Excellence And Goodwill And Draws Tourists, Family`s & Businessmen Alike. We Offer Our Guests The Best Where Luxury Meets Lifestyle. Location In Dubai Situated In The Heart Of Dubai`s Shopping District, Astoria Hotel Is Surrounded By Gold, Textile And Electric Markets, Making It A Favorite Spot For A Holiday. We Offer A Varied Choice Of Room Formats & All Our Rooms Are Newly Renovated and Equipped With Wireless Internet Access (Wi-Fi) In All Rooms. Our Business Center Is Fully Equipped and Open For 24 Hours For Hotel Guests. In Addition To Excellent Hotel Rooms, Astoria Hotel is Also Well Equipped For; Astoria hotel is well equipped with modern conferencing facilities for conducting business meetings, product launches, dealer incentives, business presentation and social meets.
